author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Renasant Corp Announces Dividend Increase And Reports Q1 EPS Of $0.68
text:
Renasant Corp:
* ORATION ANNOUNCES DIVIDEND INCREASE AND EARNINGS FOR THE FIRST QUARTER OF 2018
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.68 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.68 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF COMPANY DECLARED A QUARTERLY CASH DIVIDEND OF $0.20 PER SHARE
* PER SHARE DIVIDEND REPRESENTS A $0.01 INCREASE FROM DIVIDEND PAID IN PREVIOUS QUARTER
* NET INTEREST INCOME WAS $89.2 MILLION FOR Q1 OF 2018, AS COMPARED TO $93.3 MILLION FOR Q4 OF 2017 AND $74.0 MILLION FOR Q1 OF 2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
